entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
